name: Immersive Town
description:
THIS IS NOT A FULL GAME.

This is just a small questline made to display interactions between the player and NPC's

Vision Document, a document where I stored my ideas before I even started working on the game. Things changed along the way but this would be the overarching theme and design of the game.

Credits : Skybox, Terrain, Carts, Floor textures, Buildings, Fortifications
